summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of February 1, 2017, to February 28, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account holder, Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The statement period is from February 1, 2017, to February 28, 2017.
The ending balance for the account is $381.26.
Standard monthly service charges were waived due to not meeting balance criteria.
The document includes contact information for business banking support.
